description: Lassie: Dobson! I want you on tactical! Where the hell is Dobson?
Shawn: Lassie, I think Dobson is, uh, calling for you.
Lassie: It wasn't delivered. Dobson found it outside the file room.
Lassie: Dobson, come help me out!
Lassie (on the phone): All right, Dobson. It was worth a shot.
Lassie: Dobson, you start shaking down all his coworkers.
Lassie: Hey, Dobson, you know how to tend bar, right?
Lassie: I bet Dobson you two wouldn't last.

Trout: No, I'm appointing Officer Dobson lead on the case, effective immediately.
Lassie: Dobson? He doesn't know anything about it. Plus, he's lazy.
Lassie: And Dobson, please find out how early I can retire and still get benefits.
Lassie: Dobson actually asked for my autograph afterwards.
Lassie: It's Dobson. Talk to me, Dobson.
Shawn (on tape): Detective Dobson... What can I say? We didn't get to speak nearly as much as I ever would have liked, but I heard more about you than anyone ever could.
Lassie: Dobson. Brannigan's making these damn bracelets again. You gotta take this one.
